items.sentence: You should\'ve accepted the money Tom offered you.
You\'d be surprised how well Tom can speak French.
I can\'t tell you how relieved that makes me feel.
Tom might want to consider asking Mary for advice.
Can you remember the first time you went swimming?
Tom said that he didn\'t want to sit next to Mary.
Tom and Mary just sat there staring at each other.
I think we should really consider Tom\'s proposal.
Tom normally doesn\'t show his feelings very much.
That should never ever be allowed to happen again.
If it\'s not raining, Tom usually walks to school.
I\'m kind of sleepy so I\'ll be heading back soon.
Tom said that he hoped to be back by October 20th.
Tom said that the mistake was due to an oversight.
When I entered Tom\'s room, he was reading a book.
Why don\'t we just do it now and get it over with?
I didn\'t realize you couldn\'t understand French.
Tom doesn\'t know exactly what he should be doing.
Why aren\'t you wearing those earrings I gave you?
Why didn\'t you let me know you were in Australia?
